content: this model was designed to mark the launch of the new highland in my collection ♥ inspired by elizabeth zimmermann s famous snail hat 1 the stitch pattern is pleasant and beginner-friendly easily memorized and generates an interesting texture with this lovely yarn ======================================== **you will need one skein only to knit this cowl here is the complete list of the required material ** ---------------------------------------- - louise robert collection - highland 2 single ply 100% highland peruvian untreated wool 110 meters / 120 yards per 100g skein - 1 skeins - shown in impératrice - circular needle of 6 5 mm us #10 5 cable length of 55 cm 22 in or size required to obtain gauge - tapestry needle - stitch markers 3 stitch markers one different from the other two **size ** one size **final dimensions** circumference unstretched 46 cm 18 in height 28 cm 11 in **gauge ** 14 stitches = 10 cm 4 in stockinette stitch worked in the round la version française de ce patron se trouve sur leslainesbiscotte com 3 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snail-hat-aka-conch-or-dairy-queen 2 https //biscotte org/highland 3 https //leslainesbiscotte com/fr/collections/all/products/highland-hug-patron-de-tricot
